website_summaries.verdict: A remarkably affordable one-way remote offering numerous programming options.
pros: Class-leading range of up to 2,000 feet
Can be programmed formanual or auto transmission and gas, diesel, or hybrid motors

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for such a low price tag.
customer_reviews.text: With no experience it took me about an hour to install. I only use the remote start feature no power locks or anything else. Make sure you have a wiring diagram for your vehicle and study up ahead of time. It makes it quite a bit easier if you know what you're doing before you do it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Great 1 way remote start
customer_reviews.text: I have this installed on a 2002 Acura Rsx Type-s (manual transmission). Works well and range is decent. Install was fairly easy. Make sure you purchase a bypass module for your car. Remember this is a 1 way remote, it will not tell you that the remote start activated. You will have to look out the window or hope the signal reached. I have not had any problems remote starting at work or home.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Great remote starter
customer_reviews.text: I’ve installed many of these systems and like crimestoppers quality. For people who just want a remote starter and keyless entry without all the alarm system stuff this one is perfect. Still has plenty for programmable options that is also easy to do and they have great detailed instructions. Just bought two resently one had a power issue but they took it back right away. First time I’ve ever had a bad system from them. I will continue to recommend/use crimestopper for my future vehicles
customer_reviews.author: Kenny brickel

customer_reviews.title: Works good, interchangeable with RS-4G2
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I had the RS-4G2 installed and both the remotes got lost or broken, so instead of buying a new remote for 50$ I just bought this. Unplugged the old one plugged in the new one. Was done in 5 mins. The old g2 antenna didn't work so I swapped out with new one and no problem. Great price, so far everything works good.
customer_reviews.author: Zach g

customer_reviews.title: I didnt use this product
customer_reviews.text: I dont think I could install it myself Im trying to re sell in the box. When I purchased it , it was the same product that I had in the vehicle with out any programmable keys to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Nice remote starter, but, not for the novice.
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t know your way around automotive electrical systems I would advise to not attempt the install. I needed several external relays and resistors to make it all work and it works fine. The internal relay for heater fan could not handle the blower motor for my Dodge Ram, even though it was supposedly rated high enough. If you are skilled with automotive electrical by all means go ahead. This is not for the novice. The remote starter it’s self is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Waycaster

customer_reviews.title: all DEI and by far this crimestopper is superior, its quality is better by far
customer_reviews.text: Ive put in all kinds of remote starts, all DEI and by far this crimestopper is superior, its quality is better by far, and very easy to install, and they even give u wiring diagrams ,DEI refuses to give them to u, because they want u to have there equipment installed by there dealers. They dont realize they would sell a lot more pieces if they have the diagrams in there kits, crimestopper all the way baby!
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: I've could have gotten a better unit.
customer_reviews.text: Sucker died with 6 months use, with the cost of ripping in a short time frame, I've could have gotten a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: K_GSR

customer_reviews.title: Great System.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent range for entry level systems. I'm consistently able to remote start from roughly 200 yards (that's 2 football fields) through walls. A plethora of options (Diesel, Manual Mode, Auto-Lock, Multi-Vehicle, Turbo Timer, 2 Way Upgrade Available, etc.) not common in this price range. Like another reviewer stated, these are the best low end remotes I have run across. They weigh 2-3x what the Audiovox remotes on my other vehicle weigh and take several times more pressure to actuate the buttons (no more accidental button presses when fobs are in Your pocket). This has been one of the few times I have purchased a low priced product and it has exceeded my expectations in every area.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly...

customer_reviews.title: Great Remote Car Starter
customer_reviews.text: Great tool that provides convenience in saving you time in the morning before you go to work. It's especially helpful for those cold days when you need that extra pre-start assistance. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lovesbooks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent auto start
customer_reviews.text: Excellent auto start just make sure you plan on spending a couple hours installing it and have your vehicle wiring diagram . The range on the remote are great better than my previous auto start (viper) and the cost is great . Would buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Manman

customer_reviews.title: 01 Silverado hd
customer_reviews.text: I've never wired one of these. After I got a wiring diagram for my truck it was easy. I suggest doing that. Only problem was after it was installed I found out I needed a security bypass module for my silverado. Almost all vehicles need this for remote start. I got one and it was cheap and it's all good other than waiting. I think they should offer the bypass with the kit
customer_reviews.author: Dean p.

customer_reviews.title: great unit with this price
customer_reviews.text: great unit with this price , and worked great because I bought INT-SL+ module with this as well and very few connection I am good for Chevy Tahoe 2005.
customer_reviews.author: V-Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using for several months without problem. Works every time. Actually wearing out the buttons...lol.

customer_reviews.title: Great remote starter, durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement, but I've had it for 3 yrs, still function as always,,
customer_reviews.author: MARLON A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate just get one
customer_reviews.text: It works great just as it should. Very easy installation.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item for the price, works really good and easy to install. Fast shipping as well

customer_reviews.title: Nice made
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it. Installed to my 2012 Odyssey without problem. I only hooked up the remote start with doors,lights.the remote controls are very impressive made.

customer_reviews.title: good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: good product but must warn you the instruction to getting it to work are more complicated then installing it there 30 some diff options and stuff i just want it to start my stuff and unlock the doors not make me breakfast

customer_reviews.title: Not the easiest
customer_reviews.text: Took some expert a few days to figure it out...

customer_reviews.title: Great system for good price
customer_reviews.text: Very good system for the price, little laborsome to install but overall works great
customer_reviews.author: Ronald k.

customer_reviews.title: ... this installed for a few months now and really like it. I used it all winter long to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this installed for a few months now and really like it. I used it all winter long to warm up my Yukon before leaving home in the morning. Hasn't failed me yet and has really good range.
customer_reviews.author: Jared W.

customer_reviews.title: Remote kills batteries fast.
customer_reviews.text: Remote dies really fast. I get about 4 weeks out of a set of batteries that aren't cheap. System works good.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Scary but works great now!
customer_reviews.text: Super scary to install! But I managed and it works great! I don't recommend unless you are a serious DIY person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit but it's hard to program and it can be hard to get it to start the truck at times. That's the only reason I didn't give it a higher review. Good looking fobs though
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy without researching.
customer_reviews.text: Returned the item. Bought for my husband for Christmas. Went to have it installed and was told we needed a $200 bypass module. No where was this ever mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Best remote start
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this product. Works great! Took me only three hours to setup all kit! And engine was started on first attempt
customer_reviews.author: Stevan Stamenkovic

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: With this system able lock and unlock doors which wasn't able to before best of all start car winter

customer_reviews.title: When freezing don't work Some time don't work This is ...

customer_reviews.text: Recieved wrong one..I received rs1 only has remote start I ordered the rs4 that has 5 button remote keyless entry and remote start not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Installed fine then chip on motherboard during first start began burning. It was our first chance to install due to scheduling conflicts and we are out the money since the window to return ended 13 days ago. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome range and high quality.
customer_reviews.text: They stand up to being Crime Stopper quality. Range is amazing. Programming is easy. Good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and fair price. The seller helped me with all my questions. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Tough setup
customer_reviews.text: It's works but I had a heck of a time getting it to work initially, the wiring diagram is pretty vague and there are so many different variations and models to use it on that I just got overwhelmed. It has quit working a time or two but that is usually fixed but resetting it and I may have a loose connection some where. The manufacture's help line was useful. But for the price it sure gets the job done.

customer_reviews.title: Remote start
customer_reviews.text: Once product it comes with everything you need the only thing is it's hard to find someone to install it

customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you have a newer vehicle.. this unit doesn't come with a security bypass

customer_reviews.text: I use this product for over months and it still work fine and good function. But the remote bottom are hard to press

customer_reviews.title: Keyless entry not a alarm
customer_reviews.text: The remote start is great need to get a anti grind wire relay for the starter. Nice having keyless entry.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation
customer_reviews.text: Nice to enter a warm winter or cool summer vehicle.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. First one i put in and wasnt bad. Any questions i had were answered in 1 call. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: works great as it should
customer_reviews.text: works great as it should, can't beat the price. Was pretty hard to wire into the car but im happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: This particular model works great. The "brain" module is a cheap little plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I went thru 3 other alarms/remote starters...all 3 were defective or did not work properly in some way. This particular model works great. The "brain" module is a cheap little plastic housing but it holds up. Only thing I didn't like was that it doesn't come with a vibration sense thing (forgot what there called) for if someone taps your window or something but other than that its great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MongoInIA

customer_reviews.title: Negative pulse inverter none existent
customer_reviews.text: I could not find the npi for my vehicle and It makes me mad because I wanted the lock system to work

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Love the long range. Easy installation

customer_reviews.title: ... a friend who has installed these professionally and I love having a remote
customer_reviews.text: Have a friend who has installed these professionally and I love having a remote start

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry level remote start
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice entry level remote start/door lock kit. While it's nothing real fancy it does what it says. My husband is pretty mechanically inclined so he installed this on our 02 Durango. He did say it required some resistors and relays in order to interface properly with the doorlocks It works great and the remote has a good range as I've started the car while it was in a parking garage over 100 yards away!
customer_reviews.author: Erica C.

customer_reviews.title: but it is good.
customer_reviews.text: Chinese made, its wires are not from copper, but it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan S.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Quit working a few months after install. Item was installed correctly and worked flawlessly for about 3 months. Then one day it just quit working. I checked all wiring, replaced and reprogrammed the bypass module and still didn't work. So it had to be the remote start unit itself. Smashed it with a hammer and moved onto another product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a used vehicle and didn't get the factory fobs. This was so easy to install and also allowed me to add remote start! reprogramming was simple too. Works perfectly every time and range is amazing. Thinking of replacing wife's remote start with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: ATechnoholic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great everything I was hoping for it made the perfect gift for my wife

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I was expecting a complicated install
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was expecting a complicated install, but it was easy. Tech support was great and easy to communicate with.

customer_reviews.title: ... vehicles and I believe this has to be the best one yet
customer_reviews.text: I installed this remote start on my ford diesel and I have installed many other brands on other vehicles and I believe this has to be the best one yet. It has a very nice fob and reached a very long distance and very easy to use.. I would highly recomend this to others.. Thank You..
customer_reviews.author: WADE

customer_reviews.title: Really nice unit not to bad to install just look for ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice unit not to bad to install just look for your cars wiring diagram going to buy another for my wife's car
customer_reviews.author: Mark Barton

customer_reviews.title: Challenging Install
customer_reviews.text: Quick review, this thing is not the slightest bit easy if you don't have car wiring experience. I've changed head gaskets, but I'm a little blown away. I'm waiting on a splice/tap kit from Amazon but I'm really having trouble lining up the wiring diagram of the vehicle with the wiring diagram in the product instructions which is not very clear for a regular person IMO. I found a You Tube video but he glosses over the most important part, labeling the wires on the unit and where they should go. I'll update this review if I ever get this installed so I can see how well it actually works.
customer_reviews.author: clearanceman

customer_reviews.title: but like option of remote start at later date
customer_reviews.text: Currently using just as keyless entry, but like option of remote start at later date.

customer_reviews.text: Man. What an awesome product. I would record watch some YouTube for reference before you begon, if you are a DIY kind of person like me. Call them for tech support and wiring diagram. They hire professional tech support.

customer_reviews.title: Mine was easy A 1994 Olds Cutlass
customer_reviews.text: OK...Mine was easy A 1994 Olds Cutlass. Didn't need anything else. Just have to remember in cold weather . . . Turn the defrost on to high before leaving the car all night. Duh . . . .

customer_reviews.text: Love the idea, just wish I can get a install video

customer_reviews.title: I expected better!
customer_reviews.text: Don't start when its to hot outside or to cold. Sometimes when it does start you can't unlock the doors with the remote. So I would have to use my key. I'm very disappointed with it. Kinda defeats the purpose of having one.
customer_reviews.author: lee riggs

customer_reviews.title: Get this device
customer_reviews.text: I think it was a pretty good device. You could set it when to start if you had say a diesel. And you can program many things. The way I wired this thing up I think it would work with any vehicle. So all in all buy it!

customer_reviews.title: Got this all hooked up and it works great. One remote doesn't work properly and would like ...

customer_reviews.author: Mindy Fruhmann

customer_reviews.title: Installation coast way too much and not as listed by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The item itself has a good rating quality but I am planning to return it since the installation rate advertised and listed while you buy the item by Amazon is not totally the true coast which is $83.00 I went to the shop to get the quote and I was told it will coast $175.00 installation and not what is listed at Amazon. I will request a return label and send it back since the installation price is four times the actual item price.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad bad
customer_reviews.text: After 1 week will not even try to start unless I try 4-5 times. Will not turn motor over.

customer_reviews.title: Extra parts needed but not disclosed in ad or manual
customer_reviews.text: No mention of needing another part to make this work. My mechanic spent several hours following the instructions and finally we had to call (wait/hold) to be told I needed another $50 bypass module. No mention in ad or manual whatever. I'm not a happy camper! Ordered additional part, still doesn't work. Called support again, this time told I didn't need the extra part. but it still won't work!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor John Leathers

customer_reviews.title: Everything works but the lock and unlock I have tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything works but the lock and unlock I have tried to wire it every was with relays without relays etc.

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift so I don't know how I ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift so I don't know how I would rate it. The only problem I had with the purchase is when I clicked on the product, I showed an item and I thought it was what I was buying but when I got it and checked, it was another item and not what I bought. It turns out, when I checked, the ad contained 2 similar items so unless you look at the product box in each picture, you think the original item is the one you are getting. Just make sure you look closely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with any instructions, so you have no idea what wire is what

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my husband at Christmas and could ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband at Christmas and could not find anyone to help us to put it in his car.... once we found someone the estimate was over $200 to put in... that was ridiculous.. make sure you can find someone to put it in your care before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This system is amazing. You will not find a better value, period. I have put 3 of these on 3 different cars. Everything is very well built. Key fob is quality. Multiple auxiliary ports for added vehicle functions. Tach or voltage sensing for the remote start. Everything and more for a remote start and keyless entry system.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Very convient except 1 remote goes through batteries too fast.
customer_reviews.text: I purchaced this to replace my Crimestopper RS4-G4 when it quit working after an electrical problem with my car. I love being able to warm up the car remotely! My only complaint is one of the remotes, even though it works, goes through a battery in about 3 weeks. This is going to cost a lot over time. The other remote works fine. I haven't had to replace it's battery in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great, and love having keyless entry now
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on an older car without any security features. It works great, and love having keyless entry now. It's actually a very good kit for the price. Note you'll likely need to add some relays or their relay module for the power locks. Remotes are very nice and feel solid.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great, cost effective solution for keyless entry and remote start
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my 1990 Chevy C1500. You need to have some 12 volt knowledge or at least know how to follow wiring diagrams. Everything operates great and the range for the remotes is excellent. Note, you may need to purchase some relays depending on your application.
customer_reviews.author: Texavelle82

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bargain...works fantastic, great instructions, lots of options and extra inputs/outputs if you need them... my kid can drive to school in a nice warm car without having to go outside to warm it up. I was even able to make it so her rear defroster can be switched on with the remote too. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Typical Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great system awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on 2000 Tacoma 4x4. It was more of a job than I thought. As long as you can find your color codes (bulldogsecurity.com has all color codes). And plan on taking several hours Of taking your time. Most do it your selfers can do it. Works great. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: G Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: All remote starts are a pain to install! This is a decent product, some relays may need to be added and such. Not the best system but a solid entry level with good range and decent quality.

customer_reviews.title: Do the research on your vehicle before trying to install. Well worth the time and money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these units and have installed 3 in my vehicles. It’s an excellent buy for the money. Has great features. I’ve been using them for about a yr now and still love them.

customer_reviews.text: It was what I was looking for, and worked like it should with no problems.

customer_reviews.title: This alarm works great it comes preset with most if not all the ...
customer_reviews.text: This alarm works great it comes preset with most if not all the specs that are needed for all cars I am able to change the settings as well if needed great support for this item and Youtube has good how to on crimestopper installs the remote is solid and buttons feel good when engaged as any alarm you have to look up the wiring for your car easy to do on the internet rate this job at a 7 out of 10 (10 being Hardest do it your self project ) my car had a chip key and needed a added module to read key
customer_reviews.author: Gmguy

customer_reviews.title: Plus it's compatible with two of the most popular immobilized bypass units that I personally like to use( fortin ego-all and iDa
customer_reviews.text: I just taught myself how to install remote starts and I've done a handful already using system. I have no complaints about it at all and for the price and quality of it, it's hard to beat. Plus it's compatible with two of the most popular immobilized bypass units that I personally like to use( fortin ego-all and iDatalink alca and also tb). Everything is straight forward and easy to install with some basic knowledge about car wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, self install on 07 Silverado Classic with diesel
customer_reviews.text: Works great, self install on 07 Silverado Classic with diesel. Paired with a Crimestopper INT-SL+ blends perfectly with stock security system and door controls. Only drawback is there is only one Accessory wire that can be directly connected to vehicle. If you need two, you need to get a relay, There is a negative control wire from Remote start that will switch the relay on for second Accessory when wired up correctly. Remotes are well made, works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I liked this because while the connectors were slightly different from ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this because while the connectors were slightly different from an earlier CoolStart I had, the wiring colors and purpose were the same. Make install of a next-gen replacement easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, no problems.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well, only complaint is that it's a little difficult to feel which button is which, compared to the RS4-G4 (previous generation, I've owned both).
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes having warm car to jump in during winter
customer_reviews.text: Installation of these types of things aren't for the weak and require some persistence and troubleshooting. Self installed toward the end of last winter and still working well going into this winter. Nice to use one of these on older car (02 Santa Fe) when keyless entry is also starting to fail.
customer_reviews.author: TTR^2/lambda

customer_reviews.title: Great range! High quality sturdy remotes
customer_reviews.text: Great range! High quality sturdy remotes! Most remotes (even my oem for my chevy) are cheaply made and don't last. These feel like they will last forever! The buttons take more force than the oem remote (which is good), no more accidentally locking, unlocking or popping trunk in pocket or purse! Can buy two systems fore different cars and use one remote for both! The only bad thing (with any remote starter) is wiring them up.
customer_reviews.author: cheapring

customer_reviews.title: Have installed multiple of these, great unit for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Installed multiple of these in multiple cars, very good instructions, work well. Great range! Love that it communicates with fortin evo All bypass module.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: not worth the time.
customer_reviews.text: So I have had to replace this device 3 times now. I read all the reviews hoping that it was a great product, only to find out that the time I put into installing it and configuring it I could have had a nice $300 one installed. There has been with the first two units a hood error. The tech support was helpful but there should have been a way of bypassing this issue. To say the least I would not waste my money on something this troublesome.
customer_reviews.author: OnionPi

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to add remote start functionality to my wife's car ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to add remote start functionality to my wife's car. Seems to work as advertised, but does not include the security By-Pass unit, which is required for any vehicle with an existing security system. Ended up spending way more to have this installed when I could have purchased a different unit in-store and saved $80.
customer_reviews.author: RUFingKiddingme?

product_meta.title: Crimestopper RS4-G5 1-Way Remote Start and Keyless Entry System with Trunk Pop
product_meta.description: Style:1 way 2000 feet rangeThe CrimeStopper RS4-G5 is our remote start with keyless entry, including trunk release that offers up to 2000 ft. of range. The remotes have 5 buttons with Lock, Unlock, Start, Trunk Release and Multi-vehicle. This is the perfect system who needs that longer range or wants a remote start and the ability to replace the OEM remote with all the features this system offers.
feature_bullets: 1-Way Keyless Entry & Remote Start System with brushed metal and two 5-Button Transmitters
Brushed metal 5-button sidekick remote control transmitter
2-Way data port for easy data module hook-up
Mobile Start port for easy connection to Mobile Start MS-3 module
